paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.phenotype: advanced TTR-FAP with polyneuropathy disability (PND) score of 2 and GI symptoms

individual_records.phenotype_details: advanced TTR-FAP with polyneuropathy disability (PND) score of 2 and GI symptoms
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 50‐year‐old man with advanced TTR‐FAP due to a TTR Gly47Ala (p. Gly67Ala) mutation [late stage 1 disease with polyneuropathy disability (PND) score of 2 and GI symptoms]

functional_data.summary: The Gly47Ala mutation is associated with advanced TTR-FAP.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The patient did not want to disclose the hereditary nature of his condition to family members.
key_quotes: A 50‐year‐old man with advanced TTR‐FAP due to a TTR Gly47Ala (p. Gly67Ala) mutation [late stage 1 disease with polyneuropathy disability (PND) score of 2 and GI symptoms]

patients.phenotype: asymptomatic carrier, developed neuropathic symptoms after 3 years

individual_records.phenotype_details: developed neuropathic symptoms after 3 years of being an asymptomatic carrier
individual_records.evidence_sentence: An asymptomatic 35‐year‐old woman and mother of 2 asked for genetic testing, after 1 parent and 1 sibling tested positive for the TTR Ser50Arg (p.Ser70Arg) mutation.

functional_data.summary: The Ser50Arg mutation is associated with TTR-FAP.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The patient initially refused to return for follow-up after testing positive.
key_quotes: An asymptomatic 35‐year‐old woman and mother of 2 asked for genetic testing, after 1 parent and 1 sibling tested positive for the TTR Ser50Arg (p.Ser70Arg) mutation.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 40‐year‐old liver transplant recipient with TTR‐FAP due to a TTR Val30Met (p.Val50Met) mutation.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is associated with TTR-FAP.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The patient and his wife wanted to know if their newborn child carried the mutation.
key_quotes: A 40‐year‐old liver transplant recipient with TTR‐FAP due to a TTR Val30Met (p.Val50Met) mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: All variants extracted were from the TTR gene, with detailed penetrance data provided.
